text: The Truth about Nanjing is a Japanese movie from 2007. It is thought to be made by fundamental Japanese nationalists. In this movie they want to deny the fact of the Nanjing Massacre. == Other websites == * 'Nanking No Shinjitsu' official website (Japanese language only) * 'Nanking No Shinjitsu' Supporting Website ( Automatic translation ) Category:2007 movies
title: The Truth about Nanjing
